body:
Hi everyone.
Remember the PLUG.DJ team? We were dying some time a bit before Plug DJ got shutdown, but now with the new Plug.DJ  we will be coming back and are looking for new members to join the team to help plan and run! There will be a maximum of 6 members (bound to change over time). I have contacted the older members (The ones I was able to find and contact) and I'm awaiting response, so don't be surprised that slots will be filled but I can promise there will be spots left for applicants.

Current Members:
vladthegreat100
ViceWatercolour
99250
Administrafer
Crazy_Creeper521
Arigenn

If you are interested, please apply in the format below and email your answers at "aviplug.dj@gmail.com" or the forums (xd).

IGN:
Skype:
Timezone:
Do you have a PLUG.DJ account?:
If so, what is your PLUG.DJ username?:
Are you active on the forums?
Why do you want to join?:
How could you benefit the Team?:

You will be put in a Skype chat once you are accepted, and you may apply up to two times. 

ViceWatercolour and I will be judging your applications.
Props to Ethan for making this post last application batch - I just edited it a bit xd

Good luck!

replies.body:
IGN: Crazy_Creeper521
Skype: dylan.thomson521
Timezone: EST
Do you have a PLUG.DJ account?: Yes
If so, what is your PLUG.DJ username?: CrazyisCreeps
Are you active on the forums? Yes
Why do you want to join?: I ran a weekly plug.dj event before plug shut down this summer. It was fun, and I'd like to get into something like that again.
How could you benefit the Team?: Past experience I guess, plus I'm active in plug (well dubtrack, but I'll be moving over soon), so I'll be active to plan/run. Also got a good taste in music

replies.body:
IGN: Auratixx
Skype: live:j420ac10k
Timezone: GMT
Do you have a PLUG.DJ account?: Yes.
If so, what is your PLUG.DJ username?: Auratixx (forgot password to my previous account >.< so just created a new one).
Are you active on the forums? Yes, I constantly check the forums whenever I can.
Why do you want to join?: I love listening and sharing music and Plug.DJ is a dream come true for me, I want to ensure everyone else can enjoy music like I do, but that comes at an expense of moderation of the content, which is something I'd love to do.
How could you benefit the Team?: I was previously a Bouncer, which shows I have experience of moderation and I'm constantly listening to music whenever I'm on the computer so that's activity. I also strive to maintain organisation within teams so I can aid with organising events and such. All in all I feel I can bring activity and organisation to the Plug.DJ team.

replies.body:
Final applications will close tomorrow at 6pm EST, apply while you can and Para and I will try and get out the results of your applications tomorrow or wednesday latest!
Once again, good luck! :).

replies.body:
IGN: resepignev
Skype: flo.schmenni
Timezone: GMT+1
Do you have a PLUG.DJ account?: Yes
If so, what is your PLUG.DJ username?: resepignev (my other account is DJGFlo, sadly the facebook login doesn't work)
Are you active on the forums? Since I'm a moderator, I hope I'm active :)
Why do you want to join?: I love Plug.dj!! It's my true love xD Well, it's always fun to work together on an event or problem as a team. 
How could you benefit the Team?: I'm a long time user of plug.dj, I joined the site as the avicore update was first announced and was waiting with other 50 people in the room until it was finally released. Since then I hopped between the rooms and was staff in some of them. I was manager in the music-nation room, I trailed as bouncer in the Chillout room, sadly the site closed in that time. I mostly hang out in tastycat and as mentioned in the two rooms I was staff. I also was there as they announced the friends system and removed the fans system. (I loved to do fan4fan xD). After the update my old account was on level 14 now I'm on level 7 (close to leveling up).
I also can contribute as moderator, since it's a must to be active on all platforms I would add plug.dj to my list and people can ask questions whenever they want.
(On a not very important note: We can use the community slack as communication service instead of skype)

replies.body:
IGN: Synbolism
Skype: Vlad has it
Timezone: EST
Do you have a PLUG.DJ account?: Yes
If so, what is your PLUG.DJ username?: Nathanetrius
Are you active on the forums?: Yes
Why do you want to join?: I love music, I have 3 filled up playlists waiting to be shared.
How could you benefit the Team?: I am familiar with most of the moderation commands. I am very active on plug.dj as well.

For those who don't know, the website is only a sandbox, used to test plug for any bugs before making the official one, which explains why Gold sub is free. So plug.dj will not carry any data from the sandbox into the official one.
